  • Classes in utils used by equipments.AirConditioning.connections

  • Classes in utils used by equipments.AirConditioning.measures
    Class
    Description
    CompoundMeasure
     
    Measure
     
    MeasureI
    The class MeasureI mainly marks classes from which instance of measures are represented; the two major subclasses currently proposed represent scalar and compound measures (made of scalar measures), hence the presence of the method isScalar().
    MeasurementUnit
    The enumeration MeasurementUnit defines in a simple way the measurement units used in the HEM application.
    SensorData
    The class SensorData implements a simple sensor data, with measures and time stamping information.
    TimedEntity
    The class TimedEntity defines the common fields and methods managing the timing information of timed entities.
    TimingI
    The interface TimingI defines operation which are used to retrieve timing information associated to some entity, like the time at which some data has been retrieved or computed.

    The class MeasureI mainly marks classes from which instance of measures are represented; the two major subclasses currently proposed represent scalar and compound measures (made of scalar measures), hence the presence of the method isScalar().
